snippet: The investigation took a different turn as two friends, one with ties to the Gambino crime family, were taken into custody.
abstract: New York City police investigation of shooting on Ninth Avenue that wounded construction foreman Louis Lamburini takes a different turn as friends Anthony Marco and Robert Sasso are taken into custody; Sasso, who has ties to the Gambino crime family, is also being questioned about killing of Leslie Balogh, found dead of gunshot wounds in Queens on May 3.
lead_paragraph: The investigation took a different turn as two friends, one with ties to the Gambino crime family, were taken into custody.

headline.main: Motive Remains Uncertain in a Shooting in Midtown
headline.print_headline: Motive Remains Uncertain In a Shooting in Midtown
